title: Beta-variant recombinant booster vaccine elicits broad cross-reactive neutralization of SARS-CoV-2 including Omicron variants
content:
Publication date: 15 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 5

Author(s): Delphine Planas, Lin Peng, Lingyi Zheng, Florence Guivel-Benhassine, Isabelle Staropoli, Françoise Porrot, Timothée Bruel, Jinal N. Bhiman, Matthew Bonaparte, Stephen Savarino, Guy de Bruyn, Roman M. Chicz, Penny L. Moore, Olivier Schwartz, Saranya Sridhar
